name: Raiders of the Broken Planet: Council Apocalypse
storyline: The Fifth Council was the last faction to join the expedition to the Broken Planet. These soulless cyborgs from the moons of Saturn have been collecting archaeological data since their arrival. They're up to something... Harec fears the Council may also be looking for the Protectors. If that’s true, the Raiders need to stay ahead, and need the help of one of them. But how do you get an incorruptible enemy to cooperate?
summary: This DLC adds new challenges, characters and more to Raiders of the Broken Planet.
